    Add the client to the authenticated list.

    Broadcast a frame to every connected and authenticated clients.
    void broadcast​(Frame frame, String... logins)
    Broadcast a frame to every connected and authenticated clients excepted clients contained in the logins list.

    Initiates the connection to the database server in non blocking mode, opened in local on port 'DB_PORT'.
    private void disconnectAllClients()
    Silently closes every socketChannel registered by the selector.

    Accept the client to the public server, and assign him its Context.
    private void doConnect​(SelectionKey key)
    Finishes the process of connection with database server if possible.
    private void init()
    Initiates connection to the database server.
    void launch()
    Starts the server on a new thread, with reset parameters.
    Starts by trying to connect to the database server to which the server will verify the authenticity of the clients.

    The server does not stop accepting new clients until another thread interrupt this thread or if it calls the server.shutdown() method.

    Informations about the server state can be given with server.showInfos().
    void log​(Level level, String msg)
    Log a message.
    void log​(Level level, String msg, Throwable thrw)

    Sends a request to the database server in order to determinate if the the login exists in the database.

    Send a request to the database server in order to determinate if the pair login/password is registered in the database.

    Send a frame to a specific client authenticated to the server.

    Prints informations about the current state of the server.
    void shutdown()
    Prevents the server to allow new clients.
    void shutdownnow()
    Stops the server, which will disconnect all clients.
    private void silentlyClose​(SelectionKey key)
    Close the connection with the socketChannel.
    It does not throw exception if an I/O error occurs.

    void stop()
    Stop the client thread and interrupts the connection with all connected clients.
    It does not reset client parameters (buffers, queue and frame reader).

    Performs an action according to the available state of the given SelectionKey.
    void tryAuthenticate​(long id, boolean positiveAnswer)
    Try to authenticate the client corresponding to the given ID according to the database response.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChatHackServer

      public ChatHackServer​(int port) throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException

  • Method Details

    • launch

      public void launch() throws IOException
      Starts the server on a new thread, with reset parameters.
      Starts by trying to connect to the database server to which the server will verify the authenticity of the clients.

      The server does not stop accepting new clients until another thread interrupt this thread or if it calls the server.shutdown() method.

      Informations about the server state can be given with server.showInfos().
      Throws:
      IOException - if acceptance of a new client failed.

    • init

      private void init() throws IOException
      Initiates connection to the database server.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • run

      private void run()
      Start treating keys in the selector while the associated thread is uninterrupted.

    • disconnectAllClients

      private void disconnectAllClients()
      Silently closes every socketChannel registered by the selector.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stop the client thread and interrupts the connection with all connected clients.
      It does not reset client parameters (buffers, queue and frame reader).

    • connectToDatabase

      private void connectToDatabase() throws IOException
      Initiates the connection to the database server in non blocking mode, opened in local on port 'DB_PORT'.
      Throws:
      IOException - If connection failed.

    • treatKey

      private void treatKey​(SelectionKey key)
      Performs an action according to the available state of the given SelectionKey.
      Parameters:
      key - The key ready for an I/O action.
      Throws:
      UncheckedIOException - if acceptance caused an IOException.

    • doConnect

      private void doConnect​(SelectionKey key) throws IOException
      Finishes the process of connection with database server if possible.
      Parameters:
      key - The selection key corresponding to the server database.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • doAccept

      private void doAccept​(SelectionKey key) throws IOException
      Accept the client to the public server, and assign him its Context.
      Parameters:
      key - The key associated to the public server
      Throws:
      IOException

    • silentlyClose

      private void silentlyClose​(SelectionKey key)
      Close the connection with the socketChannel.
      It does not throw exception if an I/O error occurs.

      Removes the client associated to the key from the authenticated list.

    • authenticateClient

      private void authenticateClient​(String login, ServerContext ctx)
      Add the client to the authenticated list.
      Parameters:
      login - The login's client.
      ctx - The client's context.

    • showInfos

      public void showInfos()
      Prints informations about the current state of the server.

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Prevents the server to allow new clients.

    • shutdownnow

      public void shutdownnow()
      Stops the server, which will disconnect all clients.

      public void sendFrame​(Frame frame, String dest) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Description copied from interface: Server
      Send a frame to a specific client authenticated to the server.
      Specified by:
      sendFrame in interface Server
      Parameters:
      frame - The frame to send.
      dest - The recipient client's login.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the recipient client is not authenticated to the server.
